disclaimer.experience_differ: The user experience might differ on per phone basis.

how_to_play.title: How to play
how_to_play.step_1: 1.) Choose your preferred game mode from the bottom (classic, lizard-spock, dice) of the screen.
how_to_play.step_2: 2.) Shake the phone and the result will be on your screen as soon as you stop shaking your phone.
